item.title: CD&R公司在赛诺菲的最终竞购中排除了债务出资的股权选择权
item.description: Clayton Dubilier & Rice 在竞购赛诺菲消费者保健部门时，将银行承诺提供超过 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的债务作为其部分股权支票的条件，尽管该贷款最终没有被纳入提交给这家制药公司的最终方案中。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice made it a condition for banks to commit more than €1 billion ($1.1 billion) of debt to fund a part of the equity check for its bid for Sanofi’s consumer-health division, though the facility didn’t end up in the final package presented to the pharmaceutical firm.】

item.title: 能源老板为人工智能和零净排放全面改造电网
item.description: 作为国家电网公司（National Grid Plc）的首席执行官，约翰-佩蒂格鲁（John Pettigrew）站在美国和英国绿色转型的最前沿。这位 55 岁的行业资深人士将这种努力比作英国在维多利亚时代对基础设施的快速投资。【原文：As chief executive officer of National Grid Plc, John Pettigrew is on the frontlines of the green transition in the US and the UK. Building out power lines is critical to electrifying the economy and shifting away from fossil fuels, and the 55-year-old industry veteran likens the effort to Britain’s rapid investment in infrastructure in the Victorian era.】

item.title: 英国取消电网连接队列中一些停滞不前的 "僵尸 "项目
item.description: 英国电力网络运营商已经砍掉了 10 千兆瓦停滞不前的 "僵尸 "能源项目，切断了阻碍该国清洁电力转型的基础设施队列。【原文：UK electricity network operators have axed 10 gigawatts of stalled “zombie” energy projects, cutting the queue that’s holding up infrastructure critical to the country’s clean-power transition.】

item.title: 字节跳动将签署创亚洲纪录的 108 亿美元企业贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）将签署一笔 108 亿美元的贷款，这将是除日本外亚洲有史以来最大的美元企业融资。【原文：ByteDance Ltd., the Chinese owner of TikTok, is set to sign a $10.8 billion loan in what would be the largest-ever dollar-denominated corporate facility in Asia ex-Japan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 默多克的 REA 第四次提议收购英国房屋网站 Rightmove
item.description: REA Group Ltd. 在不到一个月的时间内对 Rightmove Plc 提出了第四份收购提案，对这家英国房地产门户网站的估值约为 62 亿英镑（87 亿美元）。【原文：REA Group Ltd. has made a fourth takeover proposal in less than a month for Rightmove Plc, valuing the UK property portal at about £6.2 billion ($8.7 billion).】

item.title: 桑坦德银行求助于 DE Shaw 对冲与法国农业信贷银行的风险投资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）对冲了其在与法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）成立的资产服务合资企业中的股权，因为这家西班牙银行正努力减轻监管负担。【原文：Banco Santander SA hedged its equity stake in an asset servicing joint venture with Credit Agricole SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as the Spanish bank seeks to lighten its regulatory burden.】

item.title: 欧洲央行 10 月降息可能性增大，欧洲债券大涨
item.description: 欧洲债券周五反弹，延续了本周的涨势，这使得10月份降息的可能性大大增加。【原文：European bonds rallied on Friday, extending gains in a week that’s left the prospect of an interest-rate cut in October looking far more likely.】

item.title: 受欧盟关税影响，中国奇瑞推迟在西班牙生产电动汽车的计划
item.description: 在欧盟对从中国进口的电动汽车征收临时关税后，奇瑞汽车公司将在欧洲生产电动汽车的目标推迟了一年。【原文：Chery Automobile Co. has pushed back a goal to bring electric-vehicle production to Europe by a year, after the European Union imposed provisional tariffs on EV imports from China.】

item.title: 可可作物看起来更大了，但这并不能解决巧克力危机
item.description: 新一季的可可收成有所好转，但这可能不足以使巧克力成本大幅下降。【原文：Cocoa harvests are looking better for the new season, but it may not be enough to bring chocolate costs down much.】

item.title: 受制裁的亿万富翁与老朋友争夺 PhosAgro 股权获胜
item.description: 被制裁的俄罗斯亿万富翁安德烈-古里耶夫（Andrey Guryev）在伦敦法庭上与一位老朋友就世界最大化肥生产商之一的股份之争取得了胜利。【原文：Sanctioned Russian billionaire Andrey Guryev won his London court fight against an old friend over a stake in one of the world’s largest fertilizer producers.】

item.title: 东海岸港口可能发生大规模罢工的更多信息
item.description: 小心。供应链再次成为新闻焦点。最快在下周，美国东海岸所有港口的工人都可能举行罢工，从而使经济中一系列工业和农业部门的贸易陷入瘫痪。那么，这关系到什么？工人们想要什么？美国政府是否有可能阻止罢工？在本期播客中，我们将与 FreightWaves 的创始人兼首席执行官克雷格-富勒（Craig Fuller）探讨这场劳资纠纷的来龙去脉，以及它将如何影响美国东海岸的贸易。【原文：Look out. Supply chains are back in the news. As soon as next week, workers at all of the ports on the US East Coast could go on strike, crippling trade across a range of industrial and agricultural parts of the economy. So what’s at stake? What do the workers want? Is there any prospect of the US government heading it off? On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Craig Fuller, the founder and CEO of FreightWaves, about what the labor dispute is all about and how it could possibly hammer th】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 8 月份消费者通胀预期下降
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank —）的数据显示，8月份欧元区消费者的通胀预期有所下降，这为下个月再次降息提供了更多理由。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro area decreased in August, according to the European Central Bank — bolstering the growing case for another reduction in interest rates next month.】

item.title: 劳动力市场降温，德国失业率增幅超预期
item.description: 德国失业率的上升幅度超过预期，这表明经济的又一次动荡正在对劳动力市场产生越来越大的影响。【原文：German unemployment rose more than anticipated — signaling that another economic rough patch is having an increasing impact on the labor market.】

item.title: 中国的经济刺激闪电战：我们目前了解到的情况及未来展望
item.description: 中国本周采取了一系列非同寻常的刺激措施，为经济注入了一针强心剂。这些措施既包括放松银根，也包括支持陷入困境的房地产行业。虽然还缺少一些细节，但不寻常的宣布速度和力度表明，中国政府有紧迫感要让经济增长步入正轨，实现 5%左右的目标，从而提振了市场情绪。【原文：China gave its economy a shot in the arm with an extraordinary flurry of stimulus measures this week. The moves range from monetary easing to support for the struggling real estate sector. While some details are missing, the unusual pace and intensity of the announcements signaled a sense of urgency in Beijing to put growth on track for the around 5% target, buoying market sentiment.】

item.title: 中国和美国推动全球股市上涨，欧洲股市试探新高
item.description: 由于中国最新的刺激措施和美国经济的乐观数据引发了全球金融市场的反弹，欧洲股市周五试探了历史新高。【原文：European equities tested new record high levels on Friday as China’s latest stimulus measures and upbeat data from the US economy triggered a global rally across financial markets.】

item.title: 毛里求斯豪华酒店经营者在北非和中东地区寻找商机
item.description: 毛里求斯市值最大的酒店运营商 Lux Island Resorts Ltd. 正寻求在北非和中东地区购买五星级度假村，以扩大其在印度洋岛国以外的投资组合。【原文：Lux Island Resorts Ltd., Mauritius’ biggest hotel operator by market value, is looking to buy five-star resorts in North Africa and the Middle East in a bid to broaden its portfolio beyond Indian Ocean island nations.】

item.title: 分析师称，石破赢得自民党选举后，日本央行重拾加息赌注
item.description: 在石破茂赢得日本执政党自民党的领导权后，日元大幅反弹，日本债券期货下跌，日经 225 指数期货回落。【原文：The yen surged in a dramatic turnaround, Japanese bond futures dropped, and Nikkei 225 Stock Average futures retreated after Shigeru Ishiba clinched leadership of Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party.】

item.title: 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 跌破 1 美元兑 14 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 跌破 1 美元兑 14 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 跌破 1 美元兑 14 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 跌破 1 美元兑 14 新低
item.description: 津巴布韦金银支持的货币兑美元汇率已跌破 14 美元，这是自五个月前开始交易以来官方市场上的最弱水平。【原文：Zimbabwe’s bullion-backed currency has slid past 14 per dollar, its weakest level on the official market since it started trading five months ago.】

item.title: 中国经济刺激政策发布后，阿里巴巴、京东和美团大涨
item.description: 在中国政府宣布采取措施刺激陷入困境的国内经济后，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）、JD.com Inc.和美团网迎来了多年来最好的交易日。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., JD.com Inc. and Meituan enjoyed their best trading days in years after the Chinese government announced measures to stimulate the troubled domestic economy.】

item.title: Authum-Led Group 以 1.02 亿美元收购 Prataap Snacks 47% 的股份
item.description: 根据周五提交的一份证券交易所文件，影子银行家Authum Investment和投资者Mahi Madhusudan Kela将以85亿卢比（1.02亿美元）的现金从Peak XV Partners手中收购印度轻餐制造商Prataap Snacks Ltd.的大量股份。【原文：Shadow banker Authum Investment and investor Mahi Madhusudan Kela will buy a large stake in Indian light meal-maker Prataap Snacks Ltd. from Peak XV Partners for 8.5 billion rupees ($102 million) in cash, according to a stock exchange filing Friday.】

item.title: 法国作为欧洲最安全债券市场之一的地位岌岌可危
item.description: 法国作为欧洲最安全的债券市场之一的地位有可能终结，因为脆弱的少数派政府正在努力解决多年来的债务问题。【原文：France’s status as one of the safest bond markets in Europe risks coming to an end as a fragile minority government struggles to address a debt problem years in the making.】

item.title: 中国万物复苏迎来多个里程碑：图表
item.description: 这是中国市场创纪录的一周。投资者对政府协调一致的财政和货币刺激政策表示欢迎，恒生指数目前有望创下 26 年来最好的一周。【原文：It’s a week for the record books in China’s markets. Investors have embraced the government’s coordinated fiscal and monetary stimulus, with the Hang Seng Index now on track for the best week in 26 years.】

item.title: 印尼力争 15 亿美元重组喀拉喀托钢铁公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼政府的目标是在下个月敲定该国最大的钢铁制造商 PT Krakatau Steel 与其贷款人之间的贷款重组协议。【原文：The Indonesian government aims to finalize a loan restructuring agreement between the nation’s biggest steelmaker PT Krakatau Steel and its lenders next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Norinchukin 的外部小组开始审查巨额债券损失
item.description: Norinchukin 银行官员向一个调查小组介绍了日本最大的农业贷款机构因投资外国债券而蒙受损失的情况，从而启动了旨在防止惨败重演的程序。【原文：Norinchukin Bank officials briefed a panel investigating losses that Japan’s largest agricultural lender incurred by investing in foreign bonds, kicking off a process designed to prevent a repeat of the fiasco.】

item.title: 电动汽车电池制造商陷入困境，Northvolt 债权人将召开会议
item.description: Northvolt AB 的一组贷款人将于周五举行会议，考虑是否向这家资金短缺的电动汽车电池制造商提供救命稻草，还是削减支持并冒着损失数十亿美元的风险。【原文：A group of Northvolt AB lenders is set to meet on Friday to consider whether to extend a lifeline to the cash-strapped maker of electric vehicle batteries or cut their support and risk losing billions.】
